ships.name: Bioship Gamma
ships.text: ACTIVATION PHASE: Place 2 [time] Tokens on this card. This ship may perform an [regenerate] Action as a Free Action.

captains.name: Bioship Gamma Pilot
captains.text: DURING THE MODIFY ATTACK DICE STEP: You may disable 2 of your Active Shields in order to convert 1 [hit] into 1 [crit]

captains.name: Bioship Pack Hunter
captains.text: DURING THE MODIFY ATTACK DICE STEP OR DURING THE MODIFY DEFENCE DICE STEP: You may recive an [aux] Token to re-roll one of your Attack or Defense Dice.

captains.name: Kivas Fajo
captains.text: SETUP DURING THE GATHER FORCES STEP: Add 1 [tech] slot and 1 [crew] slot to this ships Upgrade Bar. All equipped Upgardes to this ship must be [unique] and each costs -2sp

upgrades.name: Infiltration
upgrades.text: DURING THE ACTIVATION PHASE: Target one Captain equipped to an Opposing ship and place 3 [time] Tokens on this card. Replace the Captains Text equipped to this ship with the text on the target ships Captain until the End Phase.

upgrades.name: Fluidic Rift
upgrades.text: DURING THE PLANNING PHASE: Discard this card to place one Fluidic Rift minefield token within Range 1 of your ship but not within Range 3 of an enemy ship. DURING THE PLANNING PHASE: If a ship is within Range 1 of the minefield Token and is not a Species 8472 ship, treat all white Maneuvers as Red Maneuvers.

upgrades.name: Quantum Singularity
upgrades.text: COMBAT PHASE: Discard this card to perform a [sensor-echo] with either an 2 or 3 Maneuver Template. Even if you ship is not cloaked.

upgrades.name: Primal Instinct
upgrades.text: ACTION: If your ship receives a [crit] to its hull this round you may, if possible, make a free attack against that ship with -2 Attack Dice. The target ship rolls -1 Defense Dice. (8472 Bioship Only)

upgrades.name: Biogenic Field
upgrades.text: Increase this ships Agelity by 1. ----------------------------------------- When an enemy Upgrade targets this ship roll 1 Defence Die, 3 against a Borg Upgrade. If you roll at least one [battlestations] cancel its effect. If That canceled Upgrade is a [crew] Upgrade, immediately Discard it. (8472 Bioship Only)

upgrades.name: Energy Blast
upgrades.text: ATTACK: Spend Your [target-lock] Token, Discard this card. If your ship has a [scan] Token next to it you may spend that Token in order to convert all your [battlestations] into [hit]. (8472 Bioship Only)

upgrades.name: Biological Toxin
upgrades.text: DURING THE ACTIVATION PHASE AFTER THIS SHIP PERFORMS ITâ€™S MANEUVER: If this ships base is touching an Opposing ships base, You may discard this card in order to place 2 [time] Tokens on all Captains and [crew] Upgrades equipped to that ship even if it is Cloaked or Has Active Shields.

upgrades.name: Hatred
upgrades.text: This Upgrade does not require a Slot. ----------------------------------------- DURING SETUP AFTER ALL SHIPS HAVE BEEN PLACED: Chose a Faction, when attacking Ships or Ships with Captains of that faction you may choose to roll -2 Attack Dice in order to add 1 [crit] to your roll.

upgrades.name: Boothby
upgrades.text: This card counts as either a [tech], [weapon] or [crew] Upgrade. AFTER SETUP: Transpher this card to an opposing ship that has an open slot. ----------------------------------------- PLANING PHASE: You may place two Time Tokens on this card. CONTUNIOUS EFFECT: This ship playes its manouver dial face up during the Planing Phase. Discard this card when there are no more time tokens left on it.
